resources.string: Privacy: none of these values are sent anywhere - they are only stored locally on your device in a sand-boxed database.
Input the current balance from your bank:
Step one is to add the latest current balance from your bank account. Then click > or swipe to continue.

Enter all your transactions for the month and indicate which transactions have already cleared. In the next step you can review all of them and change which transactions have cleared. This process can be completed once in most cases since the transactions will be saved (only on the device).
Once you have completed entering all your transactions click the next icon (>).
Make sure that all transactions that have cleared are checked. To add transactions go back to the previous step.
Below is the calculated balance based on the transactions that have not cleared yet.
